scripts.cloudcore:api:local: npx cypress run  --env environment=local --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true
scripts.cloudcore:api:stage: npx cypress run --env environment=stage --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true
scripts.cloudcore:api:production: npx cypress run  --env environment=production --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true
scripts.cloudcore:posttest: npm run cloudcore:combine-reports && npm run cloudcore:generate-report && npm run cloudcore:html
scripts.cloudcore:api:local:report: npm run cloudcore:clean:reports ; npm run cloudcore:api:local ; npm run cloudcore:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudcore:api:stage:report: npm run cloudcore:clean:reports ; npm run cloudcore:api:stage ; npm run cloudcore:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudcore:api:production:report: npm run cloudcore:clean:reports ; npm run cloudcore:api:production ; npm run cloudcore:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudadmin:api:local: npx cypress run  --env environment=local --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudadmin/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudadmin/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true
scripts.cloudadmin:ui:local: npx cypress run  --env environment=local --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudadmin/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudadmin/ui/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true
scripts.cloudadmin:api:stage: npx cypress run  --env environment=stage --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudadmin/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudadmin/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true
scripts.cloudadmin:ui:stage: npx cypress run  --env environment=stage --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudadmin/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudadmin/ui/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true
scripts.cloudadmin:posttest: npm run cloudadmin:combine-reports && npm run cloudadmin:generate-report && npm run cloudadmin:html
scripts.cloudadmin:api:local:report: npm run cloudadmin:clean:reports ; npm run cloudadmin:api:local ; npm run cloudadmin:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudadmin:api:stage:report: npm run cloudadmin:clean:reports ; npm run cloudadmin:api:stage ; npm run cloudadmin:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudadmin:api:production:report: npm run cloudadmin:clean:reports ; npm run cloudadmin:api:production ; npm run cloudadmin:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudadmin:ui:local:report: npm run cloudadmin:clean:reports ; npm run cloudadmin:ui:local ; npm run cloudadmin:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudadmin:ui:stage:report: npm run cloudadmin:clean:reports ; npm run cloudadmin:ui:stage ; npm run cloudadmin:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudadmin:ui:production:report: npm run cloudadmin:clean:reports ; npm run cloudadmin:ui:production ; npm run cloudadmin:posttest ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudapps:api:local: npx cypress run  --env environment=local --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudapps/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudapps/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true ; sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudapps:api:stage: npx cypress run  --env environment=stage --config-file 'cypress/integration/cloudapps/config/cypress.json' --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudapps/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
scripts.log-report-to-file: cypress run --quiet 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
